citation.article-title: Reclassification of Cellulosimicrobium variabile Bakalidou et al. 2002 as Isoptericola variabilis gen. nov., comb. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Isoptericola variabilis Bakalidou et al. 2002 corrig., comb. nov.
Isoptericola variabilis (va.ri.aâ€²bi.lis. L. masc. adj. variabilis variable, as cells can be rods or cocci).
The description is the same as that given by Bakalidou et al. (2002) with the modification of the amino acid composition of the murein, as given in the genus description.
The type strain is MX5T (=DSM 10177T=ATCC BAA-303T).
